level.heading: RENTAL HOUSING CASES – SUBSTITUTION OR ADDITION OF PARTIES (§ 1-2927)

level.text: 2927.1 An Administrative Law Judge may substitute or add a party underubsection 2816.1 if: a party dies; a party entity is dissolved or reorganized; party entity’s ownership or interest changes; or an amended registrationtatement for the housing accommodation is filed under 14 DCMR § 4103.
2927.2 If a party has been incorrectly named, the Administrative Law Judge mayubstitute or add the correct party under Subsection 2816.1.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5674, 5677 (July 14, 2006); asmended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12578 (December1, 2010).
